EmailTemplate.name: 201809_DSILicense_LG.201809_DSILicense_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Sourcing Update for Our Condition-Based Maintenance & Health Usage Monitoring Systems
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> SOURCING UPDATE FOR OUR CONDITION-BASED MAINTENANCE AND HEALTH USAGE MONITORING SYSTEMS Dear Customer: You have received this email because our records indicate that this information is relevant to you. If you no longer need this information, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Distribution-Update.html]]> to update your information.
As part of our continuing efforts to improve service of our Condition-Based Maintenance Systems (CBMS) and Health Usage Monitoring Systems (HUMS) product lines, Honeywell Aerospace has entered into a licensing and a master distributorship agreement with Diagnostic Solutions International (DSI) LLC. DSI is an industry-leading company with a combined over 350 years experience in diagnosing and solving complex vibration issues. These changes will not affect OEM and United States military/Department of Defense customers using model RECON, 1134, 1209, 1239 or ZTE products. License Agreement - Effective October 1, 2018 DSI is now licensed to manufacture the CBMS/HUMS product line components which are currently manufactured in Olathe.
- Development of Software Applications and Ground Station Software is licensed to DSI. - Service Level Agreements (SLA) for Olathe HUMS Data Analysis Services is being transitioned to DSI. - Honeywell will continue to produce all Data Acquisition Units, Trackers, and select Sensors. - All accessories currently manufactured in Olathe, (e.g. brackets, cables, application software, ground software, etc.) will transition to DSI.
Master Distributor Agreement - Effective October 1, 2018 DSI is the Master Distributor for CBMS/HUMS as defined in the table below.
- Honeywell will no longer have a distribution agreement with the CBMS/HUMS distributors. - DSI has advised that they intend to maintain these existing companies as their CBMS/HUMS distributors. - Current distributors in Japan and China are not affected.
Order models and specific part numbers from:

See the entire impacted parts list here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/CombinedPartList_CBMS.xlsx]]>. What do you need to know about placing orders?
- Existing production orders - Existing orders placed before October 1, 2018 will be honored and shipped with the appropriate Honeywell 8130 or Certificate of Conformance. - New production orders - Effective Monday, October 1, 2018, order from the designated location identified on the chart above. - Repair orders:
- Commercial: Direct orders to DSI or the DSI distributor network. - U.S. Military/OEM: Direct orders to Honeywell or DSI or the DSI Distributor network.
- Exchanges
- DAU part numbers 1239-6050-FA, 901-15175, 901-17700 - Commercial: Direct orders to DSI or the DSI distributor network - OEM: Direct orders to Honeywell or DSI or the DSI Distributor network.
- AOG (Item A)- Effective October 1, 2018, all AOG shipments will be supported by DSI. - AOG (Item B)- No change - contact Honeywell.
What information do I need to have to establish DSI as a new supplier? Update your authorized supplier list and internal systems to include the new supplier location as an approved supplier:
- Company Name: Diagnostic Solutions International LLC - Address: 2580 East Philadelphia Street, Unit C - City, State: Ontario, CA - Postal Code: 91761 - Country: United States - Phone: 1-877-374-5521 or International +1-909-930-3600 - CAGE CODE: 4Z9A3 - DUNS number: 804760929 - AS9120, AS9100: 194671-2016-AQ-USA-ANAB, 194672-2016-AQ-USA-ANAB - Contact email: chadwick@dsi-hums.com <mailto:chadwick@dsi-hums.com> - Web Address: www.dsi-hums.com <http://www.dsi-hums.com>
If you have any questions, please reach out to your Customer Support Program Manager (CSPM). Identify my CSPM. <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us#directory]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Visit MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/R00q00oI0G002000QQXh7Z0]]>
